strapiPost.title: Let's Get Together
strapiPost.content:
Bella Vista's natural beauty, rapidly expanding trail system, and lakes make it an oasis for those that love the outdoors. This natural beauty makes Bella Vista a great place to host special events.

  • The spot: Overlooking Loch Lomond with a great vantage point for sunset, Lakepoint is a picturesque location for weddings, holiday parties, and corporate events.
  • Jack of all trades: In addition to a great view, Lakepoint has the all resources to make your event great: a restaurant, a tasting room, a pergola overlooking the lake, and even an event planner.

Check out all Lakepoint has to offer HERE.
